topic.title: Running a DITA Map ANT Transformation

keywords.indexterm: DITA Mapstransforming DITA Mapsrunning an ANT transformation

body.p: The transformation is run as an external ANT process so you can continue using the application as the transformation unfolds. All output from the process appears in the DITA Transformation tab.
body.note: The HTTP proxy settings are also used for the ANT transformation so if the transformation fails because it cannot connect to an external location you can check the the Proxy preferences pageNetwork Connections.
